Revised Summary:

In modern-day America, an ancient mirror that shows viewers a vision of a future without a tragedy has been passed from person to person, leading each one to become obsessed with it. The mirror has been moved from location to location until it ends up on the west coast. Each new owner is different, and the mirror's power takes a different toll on them. However, the mirror's allure of a brighter future ultimately leads to a diminished present and takes an emotional, spiritual, mental, and/or psychological toll on them. A group of individuals of different ages and genders must come together to break the curse and free themselves and future generations from the mirror's grasp.

Chapter 1 - The Auction

The mirror is sold at an auction in New York and ends up in the hands of a young couple. We see how the couple's relationship changes as they become more and more obsessed with the mirror's visions of an alternate future.

Chapter 2 - The Inheritance

The mirror is inherited by an older woman who lost her husband in a tragic accident. We see how the mirror's power helps her deal with her grief but also causes her to neglect her present life.

Chapter 3 - The Gift

The mirror is given as a gift to a successful businessman who becomes obsessed with the mirror's visions of an alternate future. We see how his obsession leads him to make reckless decisions that damage his relationships and business.

Chapter 4 - The Forgotten

The mirror is forgotten in an antique shop, where it is discovered by a lonely teenager who becomes obsessed with the mirror's vision of a future without his troubled home life. We see how the mirror's power takes a toll on his mental health and relationships.

Chapter 5 - The Resistance

The group of protagonists begins to resist the mirror's power, each one bringing their own unique perspective to the fight. We see how they come together to break the curse and destroy the mirror.

Chapter 6 - The Consequences

As the group continues to resist the mirror's power, they begin to suffer consequences. We see how the mirror fights back, tempting each one with visions of an alternate future.

Chapter 7 - The Betrayal

One member of the group betrays the others, using the mirror's power for their own gain. We see how the group reacts to the betrayal and how it sets them back in their mission to destroy the mirror.

Chapter 8 - The Revelation

The group discovers the true history of the mirror and the source of its power. We see how this knowledge helps them in their mission and how they come up with a plan to destroy the mirror once and for all.

Chapter 9 - The Battle

The group faces off against the mirror and its power, risking everything to break the curse. We see how each member's unique experiences and perspectives come together to finally destroy the mirror.

Chapter 10 - The Resolution

The mirror is destroyed, and the group finally begins to heal and move on from their experiences. We see how they each learn to appreciate the present and the people in their lives, and how they vow to protect future generations from the mirror's curse.
